articles.title: See Mercury shine brightly in the sky this Christmas - Space.com
articles.description: The closest planet to the sun, Mercury, shines brightly over Christmas as it reaches its highest altitude in the evening sky on Christmas morning.

Santa Claus won't be the only visitor to our night skies this Christmas Eve.
